attributes.action: Support all war veterans from the 1st World War to date and to provide them with a good living and standard of accomodation and not just reject them and forget them as they get old!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should give thanks for our war veterans by ensuring that they are treated properly by being financially supported and provided with decent accomodation for the remainder of their lives (no matter how long that is). Far too many of our heroes are being forgotten & left in below standard accomodation and are only provided with a measly amount to live on. This is unacceptable and we need to take action to ensure that these, our heroes are properly provided for and feel proud to be British!
